title: LF Team to Coach (Bronze-Gold)
body:
Hey guys,

As the title suggests, I've been wanting to coach for a little while and thought I'd give coaching teams a try. I peaked at P1 in S5 and have scrimmed against players and teams from Diamond all the way to Challenger. I'm confident I can bring some improvements to your personal and team game given some time, so if you're keen drop me a message.
